title: Create a tabbed screen in the example code using new jQuery
description:
Using jQuery 1.4.3, we can create some additional examples, particularly when we want to show tabbed entries.

Depends on SOLR-2213

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: Even though I opened this, I think we should just close it as "won't fix". The more I think about this the less sense it makes to divert effort from other work. This would only be an example, unrelated really to anything core to Solr/Lucene. I also doubt that it's generally useful.
